snippet.title: Pixel Washer: Devlog 2
snippet.description:
🎬 TIMELINE
0:00 Intro
0:38 Tutorial
2:37 Mud Puddles
5:17 Wind
6:46 Tacotruckipede
7:16 Infinite Art
8:17 Features and polish
9:01 Footsteps
11:05 Oink button
11:30 Player skins
13:16 Interstitial
13:41 Auto level select
14:42 User interface
16:21 Credits
17:17 Configurable input
18:34 Power washers
22:53 Optimization
24:34 Z-sorting
27:12 Platform tweaks
29:00 Outro

🔗 LINKS
* Pixel Washer: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2572060/Pixel_Washer/
* Pixel Washer devlog 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M5Cr3B2XBmk
* Stray: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1332010/Stray/
* Put Your Name on Your Game, a Talk by Bennett Foddy and Zach Gage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N4UFC0y1tY0
* The Valadria Discord: https://discord.gg/ZmSNkuPDfu

🛠️ TOOLS
* I'm using a homegrown ECS (entity component system) made in JavaScript
* Electron: https://www.electronjs.org/
* Visual Studio Code: https://code.visualstudio.com/
* Tiled: https://www.mapeditor.org/

📙 BOOK
* How to Make a Video Game All By Yourself: https://www.amazon.com/How-Make-Video-Game-Yourself/dp/1736576208/

#gamedev #pixelart #devlog 

Thanks for watching!
